'''Anemo Crystalfly''' is a type of [[Crystalfly]] that can be found in the wild in [[Mondstadt]].

==Drops==
{{Card|Crystal Core|1}}

Catching one for the first time will add this creature's entry into the player's in-game [[archive]].
